mapper.select: select pId, name, thumb, pDate, oId, stock, originPrice, marketPrice from ( select rownum rn, p.product_id pId, p.product_name name, p.product_thumb thumb, p.product_date pDate, o.option_id oId, o.option_stock stock, o.option_origin_price originPrice, o.option_market_price marketPrice from product p inner join options o on (p.product_id = o.product_id and o.option_id = concat(p.product_id,'001') ) inner join wish_list w on (w.product_id = p.product_id and w.user_id = #{userId}) where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
mapper.insert: insert into wish_list (USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, WISH_DATE) values (#{userId},#{prodId}, sysdate)
